summary: This document is a Navy Federal Credit Union Visa credit card statement for an account in the name of Glenda Anderson-Layne, covering the period ending January 3, 2019. It shows a balance of $105.32, which was subsequently paid in full. The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting it is a financial record of interest to investigators.

persons.name: Glenda Anderson-Layne
persons.context: The individual named on the Navy Federal Credit Union Visa credit card statement. The statement shows transactions and a payment.

events.title: Payment Received on Credit Card
events.description: A payment of $105.32 was received and posted to the Navy Federal credit card account, paying off the statement balance.

keyFacts: The credit card statement is in the name of Glenda Anderson-Layne.
The account had a balance of $105.32 as of January 3, 2019, which was paid in full by January 13, 2019.
The document is a standard financial record with no explicit mention of Jeffrey Epstein, his associates, or illegal activities within the provided text.
